commit_list.message: [QUOTES] made a gather quotes funciton in the quote model on the quote class
pQUOTE] fixed display bug in quotes table
[ROOT] made quotes index the root page
[ARCH] removed database.yml, made example mysql one, ignored datbase.yml in git
[QUOTES] rails generate scaffold Quote stock_id:integer dividend:float exdate:date dividend_per_share:float last_price:float
[STOCK] rails generate scaffold Stock name:string ticker:string
[HAML] added haml generator, for reals this time
[GEMFILE] updated gems as all wont compile

[HOME] import normalize, type base, and a basic style file and replace the 
content of existing files with an example page
[ARCH] gotta temp remove this file, because recording with chrome caching redirects is a pain
[DATA] an example use of data file
[GH PAGES] relative path for normal github pages deploy
[PAPERCLIP] lock to more specific version to stop installation problems

commit_list.message: [VIEW] added inactive class too inactive tabs

Updates readme to include rails encrypted secrets.

Addresses #43, adds documentation for secret_key_base, 
spreedly_environment, spreedly_key, spreedly_secret, gateway_token as
encrypted secrets.
[STYLELINT] move stylelint into rake task, remove some old .keep files, add package requirements in package.json, add style lint to default rake task (#5)

Merge pull request #3 from dailydrip/feature/add-stylelint

Add stylelint rules

Merge pull request #4 from dailydrip/feature/admin

Feature/admin
[USERS] basic devise setup and admin bool
[TESTS] lower test limit to 20% for now
[TESTS] first spinach tests for visitor page
[TESTS] move the capybara window resize down to @javascript only

Merge pull request #1 from dailydrip/feature/add-front-end

Add front-end stack
[APPLICATION] application model and first rspec test
[TESTS] found a way toke make the default rake task work properly with the code coverage

[RAKE] set default rake task to run rubicon, then spec, then spinach. Had to back simplecov down to 1% because it’ll cause an error and exit on the spec, never making it to spinach. not sure how to fix that one yet.
[TESTING] rspec, simplecov, capybara with headless chrome, launch, webock
[RAILS] generated rails, made work with rubocop

Merge pull request #2 from dailydrip/feature/liscense

[LICENSE] add MIT license, yay OSS

Feature/models (#6)

* [models] generate models and such

* [AUTH] added cancan

* [API] stub out api key

* [OFFERS] stub out offers

* [CANCAN] rubocop generated file

* [API] random notes

* [APP] add api keys relationship, more tests

* [OFFER] add coupons relationship

* [COUPON] fix factory, add validations, test them

* [Invoice] add relationships, validations

* [COUPON] clean up coupons a bit

* [LINEITEM] fill out line item model and tests

* [LINEITEM] add description in comment

* [OFFER] switch string to BD for amount

* [PAYMENTS] add tests and validations for payments

Feature/rename application model (#7)

* [APP] rename application to app

* [APP] migrate migrations ;)

* [APP] migrate admin

* [APP] migrate factories

* [APP] migrate specs

* [APP] migrate models
[ARCH] add spec api doc gem, specify some versions better
[API] base controller, mock up app and offers controller
[ROUTES] fill out API spec and basic routes

[MODELS] Arch Review Tweaks.

Adds comments on models where we could tweak a few items.
Removes concerns folder since we aren’t using it
Minor changes for readability.

Adds a display card type for pretty printing the card type to the 
payment method model.
Style card number and CVV inputs on add payment method page.

Makes the app controller only redirect to an invoice if an invoice is 
set.
Adds some development helper links to the visitor index.
Update rubocop only for what we need on seeds.

Update the payment method form to automatically check the first payment
method.

Merge pull request #35 from dailydrip/fix-env-vars-for-tests

Use env vars in the right places.

Merge pull request #36 from dailydrip/feature/easy_fixes

Feature/easy fixes
Update setup instructions inside of readme.
Remove not needed routes and api specs
Create public token on manager automatically.
Fix redirect from admin on login when a user doesn’t have permissions.

Fixes step that i should be on an offer page, when we were looking for 
an invoice page.

Relocates some strings in the views for offers, payment methods, 
invoices, and checkouts.
Updates features to be a little more readable and clears some pending.

Merge branch 'copy_editing' of https://github.com/yrgoldteeth/isotope-rails3 into yrgoldteeth-copy_editing

  spell occurring correctly, change re-occurring to recurring
  typo on saas service page
  standardize Isotope11 to be Isotope|eleven throughout contact pages
  standardize Isotope11 to be Isotope|eleven throughout root pages
  standardize Isotope11 to be Isotope|eleven throughout community pages
  standardize Isotope11 to be Isotope|eleven throughout services pages
  typos and syntax changes to services pages
  typo on community index page of corp site
  capitalize Service in Software as a Service
  find and replace facebook to Facebook on corp site
  find and replace lowercase ruby to Ruby
